snippet: While official figures show scant economic growth, a confidence survey seems to show enthusiasm for proposals by the Italian government and relief that the euro crisis has eased.
abstract: Floyd Norris Off the Charts column; Italian economy has been lagging for years, with stagnant growth and high unemployment, but European financial markets have picked up and consumer confidence is at highest level in years.
lead_paragraph: While official figures show scant economic growth, a confidence survey seems to show enthusiasm for proposals by the Italian government and relief that the euro crisis has eased.
